ProjectTypeGuids.description: A list of GUIDs that activate Visual Studio design-time capabilities in projects that use the non-SDK format.
ProjectTypeGuids.deprecationMessage: This property is not used in SDK-format projects

ProjectGuid.description: A GUID that uniquely identifies the project within the solution
ProjectGuid.deprecationMessage: This property is not used in SDK-format projects

ProjectCapability.description: ID that activates Common Project System extensions in Visual Studio

PropertyPageSchema.description: XAML rules that control how items, properties and metadata are treated by the Common Project System in Visual Studio

Context.description: The Common Project System context to which the XAML rules apply

type.description: Common Project System XAML rule context

values.File: The rules apply at a per-item level, or apply defaults to items at the project level
values.Project: The rules apply at the project level
values.PropertySheet: The rules apply only to property sheets.
values.BrowseObject: The rules apply to an item in the the Properties tool window when it is selected in the Solution Explorer.
